nav.helpAvailable: Help is available for this feature

help.title: Help & Documentation
help.subtitle: Find guidance for workflows, ISO 21500 concepts, and guided co-authoring.

notFound.title: Topic not found
notFound.description: This help topic does not exist yet.

steps: Open Guided Builder from the primary navigation entry.
Complete project setup and choose artifacts.
Review and launch the generated workspace.
guided-builder.details: Guided Builder keeps artifact creation aligned with ISO 21500 structure through guided phases and review checkpoints.

steps: Start Assisted Creation from your project workspace.
Answer prompts and refine generated draft content.
Save a draft or snapshot and continue later if needed.
assisted-creation.details: Assisted Creation focuses on co-authoring artifacts with AI while preserving user control and review visibility.

steps: Open readiness checks from the project workflow area.
Review pass/warn/fail outcomes and suggested actions.
Address gaps before proposal review and apply phases.
readiness-builder.details: Readiness Builder verifies required governance and documentation signals before advancing critical workflow milestones.

steps: Create and plan work in Guided Builder.
Validate readiness, then move through proposal review.
workflows.details: Workflow stages are designed to support transparent, auditable co-authoring from planning through approval.

steps: Create or open a project from the Projects view.
Use Guided Builder to scaffold core artifacts.
Run readiness checks and iterate with proposals.
first-steps.details: First-time users can follow this sequence to move from project setup to governed delivery quickly.

firstSteps.title: First Steps with AI Project Manager
firstSteps.summary: Quick onboarding guide for new users.
firstSteps.content: Learn the essentials of setting up projects, generating artifacts, and moving through governed review steps.

iso21500.title: Understanding ISO 21500
iso21500.content: ISO 21500 provides high-level guidance for project governance, planning, delivery, and control.

gb.title: Guided Builder
gb.content: Guided Builder helps you create project scaffolding and core artifacts with structured workflow checkpoints.

ac.title: Assisted Creation
ac.content: Assisted Creation combines prompts, draft generation, and iterative editing to speed up authoring while preserving review control.

rd.title: Readiness Builder
rd.content: Readiness Builder evaluates governance and artifact completeness so teams can identify and close delivery gaps early.

workflows.title: Workflow Stages
workflows.content: The platform workflow links guided setup, co-authoring, readiness checks, and proposal review into one traceable delivery model.

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: Projects organize artifacts, workflows, proposals, and audit history for a specific initiative.

artifacts.title: Artifacts
artifacts.content: Artifacts represent key project outputs such as charter, WBS, RAID, and schedules, with lifecycle states and review gates.

raid.title: RAID Log
raid.content: RAID tracks risks, assumptions, issues, and dependencies to support proactive governance decisions.

guidedCoAuthoring.title: Guided Co-Authoring
guidedCoAuthoring.content: Guided co-authoring combines AI speed with human review checkpoints to maintain quality and auditability.

name.title: Project/Artifact Name
name.content: Use clear, domain-relevant names to improve discoverability across workflows and reviews.

description.title: Description
description.content: Capture scope, intent, and expected outcomes so collaborators can review changes with context.

artifactType.title: Artifact Type
artifactType.content: Artifact type determines expected structure and governance checks used during creation and review.

banner.offline: Offline: changes are saved locally. You can sync later.

table.name: Name
table.searchPlaceholder: Search by key, name, or description

empty.title: No projects yet
empty.text: Create a project or import an existing workspace.

empty.title: No RAID items yet

empty.noFilterMatchesDescription: Try adjusting or clearing your filters to see more results.

welcome.title: Welcome to Guided Builder
welcome.description: Create a project step-by-step with AI assistance and best-practice defaults.

projectSetup.description: Define your project basics before artifact generation.

review.description: Review your setup and continue to project workspace.

blocked.label: Blocked
blocked.helper: You can pause and continue later. Your progress is saved.

draft.empty: No draft yet. Answer the prompts to generate content.
